meanings.definition: A type of dark, fine-grained volcanic rock.
meanings.sent1: The scientists studied the basalts to learn more about volcanic activity.
meanings.sent2: The hiking trail was surrounded by towering basalts formed from ancient lava flows.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to climb the steep basalts but kept slipping down.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as solid as the basalts that make up the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the shimmering basalts against the sunset was breathtaking.
